name: Comprehensive System Health Check
description: Quick but thorough validation of all system components including technical, business, and user interface aspects

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Create a comprehensive TypeScript cleanup plan for the project addressing:
1. Install and configure missing type declarations (@types packages)
2. Fix type assertions and null checks
3. Proper error handling patterns
4. Database and API type definitions
5. Component prop type definitions

Key focus areas:
- Client component TypeScript errors
- Server-side type safety
- Authentication type definitions
- Database interaction types
assignedTasks.workflowContext: The project has 488 TypeScript errors that need to be addressed systematically before we can safely deploy. We need a structured cleanup plan that preserves functionality while improving type safety.

workflowTemplate.name: Comprehensive System Health Check
workflowTemplate.description: Quick but thorough validation of all system components including technical, business, and user interface aspects
coordinationSteps: 1. Initialize workflow and assign tasks to agents
2. Monitor agent progress and task completion
5. Validate success criteria and compile results
successCriteria: All assigned agents respond and acknowledge their tasks
All expected deliverables are provided by agents
No blocking errors or failures in task execution
zara provides: API endpoint health check
victoria provides: Core business flow validation
aria provides: UI component status check
aria provides: User experience flow validation
